ad-deeppaths.description: Lists Active Directory groups that are part of 'Member Of' chains with 5 hops or more
ad-deeppaths.query: MATCH p=(n:AD_Group)-[:AD_MEMBER_OF*5..]->(:AD_Group) WITH nodes(p) AS groups UNWIND groups as group RETURN DISTINCT group

ad-emptygroups.description: Lists Active Directory groups that contain no users or computers, either directly or indirectly
ad-emptygroups.query: MATCH (n:AD_Group) where n.scope=0 RETURN n ORDER BY n.name

ad-grouploops.description: Lists Active Directory groups that have membership loops back to themselves
ad-grouploops.query: MATCH p=(n:AD_Group)-[:AD_MEMBER_OF*]->(n) WITH nodes(p) as groups UNWIND groups as group RETURN DISTINCT group
